Requirements You are wielding a weapon with the area or automatic trait.

Your opponents can run, but they can't hide! You spray your area weapon in the general direction of an unseen enemy, revealing its location. Make an @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.6ctkxUnVwqooSvgg]{Auto-Fire} or @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire} attack. If the primary target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, you don't need to attempt a flat check to target it, and if it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, the DC of the flat check to target it is 5. When you suppress a concealed creature with this attack, the debris around it helps reveal its current position and no flat check is needed to target it; If it is hidden, the DC of the flat check to target it becomes 5 and the creature can't become undetected. This benefit lasts as long as the creature remains @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed}.
